entry.title: Through Fire and Time II (9-1-1 x 9-1-1: Lone Star Fanfic)
entry.summary:
Author: actuallynate

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,182Chapters: 17/32Kudos: 39

Summary: Same number, different city.Elliot "Eli" Hayes thought he had found stability and belonging with the 126 in Austin - a firehouse that helped him heal from his past and grow into his role as a paramedic. But life, as unpredictable as ever, throws him a curveball when a sudden reshuffle forces him to temporarily leave the comfort of the firehouse family and take up a position with the 118 in Los Angeles.Returning to his hometown stirs up old memories, unresolved grief, and unexpected challenges. With his panic disorder still a lingering shadow, Eli must navigate the dynamic and high-pressure environment of the 118 while proving himself to a new team.Meanwhile, his close friend, Ravi Panikkar, struggles to find his footing at the 252 firehouse in New York under the shadow of Captain Sal Deluca, a once respected leader whose toxic ways threaten to unravel Ravi's confidence and safety.TRIGGER WARNING: This story contains themes of panic disorder, hypochondria, and anxiety attacks, as well as references to trauma, medical procedures, suicide, drug names and high-stress emergency situations. Reader discretion is advised.

entry.title: Buck is Never the First Choice
entry.summary:
Author: tapsandtomes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,752Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 115

Summary: Buck takes over Eddie's lease so he can go be with Christopher - but Eddie's reaction is NOT what he expected.Buck's POV from Eddie Finds His Joyhttps://archiveofourown.org/works/64813690Spoilers for season 8 - this is based on the scene where Buck tells Eddie he is taking over his lease, and it carries on from there. When it overlaps with real scenes from the show, I try to keep it as close to the original dialogue as possible. There's some spicy bits, but this also gets pretty serious. Heavy themes of emotional abuse and trauma - especially making people feel less than or unworthy.

entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,687Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 351

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until you can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready.  --OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14.--Updates on Wednesdays. Title from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: All the quiet places
entry.summary:
Author: sageevreeen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,795Chapters: 8/50Kudos: 90

Summary: New walls, old ghosts. Buck is trying to settle into a house that once felt like home, but the silence that follows him is heavier than the boxes he’s unpacking. A fight left words unsaid and distance that keeps stretching. He tells himself he’s fine, that distractions are enough. But some nights are quieter than others—and some silences cut deeper than they should. Or, Buck kisses Eddie before he leaves for El Paso. Buck struggles, falling into unhealthy coping mechanisms, and Eddie comes back to take care of him. Eventually, they find their way to each other—there’s a proposal, a wedding, and a promise that sticks.

entry.title: The Clarity of Fire
entry.summary:
Author: DemonToBee

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,799Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Eddie, who has been living in Texas for about 6 months, decides to come to LA to confront Buck about his constant involvement in his relationship with Chris. At least, that is what he tells himself. But a tragic turn of events postpones the inevitable confrontation and hurls both Eddie and Buck back into memories of the past 6 months and the realizations that came during the time apart. In the end, both of them must find a way to communicate their innermost feelings before they grow further and further apart.

entry.title: Never Let Me Go ( A Sinner Like Me)
entry.summary:
Author: colescharms

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,449Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 142

Summary: When infamous rockstar Evan “Buck” Buckley gets injured (again), his label hires Army vet-turned-EMT Eddie Diaz to shadow him on tour. Eddie’s job is simple: keep Buck breathing. But nothing about Buck is simple—not his smile, not his secrets, and definitely not the way he starts to feel like home.Eddie’s supposed to keep Buck safe. Buck’s supposed to stay out of trouble. But somewhere between motel parking lots, midnight emergency calls, and songs that sound too much like confessions, lines blur—and hearts get caught in the wreckage.This tour might save Buck’s career. It might ruin Eddie’s life. Or maybe, if they’re lucky, it could be the start of something louder than either of them expected.

entry.title: How Can We Go Back To Being Friends
entry.summary:
Author: Buddie_dryhumping

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,501Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 14

Summary: "You'll find someone soon, buckaroo." Chimney finshes with a wink.Eddie stares at Buck longingly. "Yeah, soon," Eddie agrees, with a lovesick smile and matching sigh, before looking down into his drink.Buck looks at Eddie again, matching Eddie's longing stare. "Yeah, maybe." Buck chuckles, a smile spreading wide.OrBuck and Eddie finally know how the other one feels their relationship right in the palm of their hand but a bump on the road causes it to break. Can they begin to rebuild it will the tiny piece that remains be enough.OrBuddie friends with benefits to lovers

entry.title: i have more than enough
entry.summary:
Author: starsandthesea

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 901Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Hen tilted her head and squinted at Buck, “Are you happy?”Had he heard that right?“Am I happy?”“Yes. Answer me, I know you’re doing better, but are you happy?”“Uh… Yeah… Why?Of course he was happy. He was 6 months into his marriage with the love of his life. Along with Christopher, they had already been functioning as a family unit for pretty much the past 10 years, but now it was official which made it all the sweeter. How could he not be happy?Or the one in which Buck gets injured on a call and has to take leave to heal. Hen and Karen conspire and get him to watch a show while he's out to test a theory they've had about him for a bit (they end up being right because of course). Cute stuff and happiness ensues...

entry.title: my girlfriend, eddie
entry.summary:
Author: maydecember

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,054Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 125

Summary: He knows this is dangerous, that he's feeling things he normally tries to ignore much stronger than usual, but he thinks if he lets go right now he’ll die. “Hey. You know what I was doing when you were stuck in that well?”“I was trying to dig you out. I couldn't stand the thought of you being trapped like that. But you got yourself out, didn't you?”or; Eddie sees the TV glow.
